xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:title: XCCDF Benchmark That References the Validation Content for the textFileContent5454_test
xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:description: This XCCDF Benchmark references the OVAL Definitions in the validation content for the textFileContent5454_test.

xccdf:metadata.dc:contributor: National Institute of Standards and Technology
